title: About blue essence
body: I wanted to ask if Riot can grant me 1 blue essence because I lacked of it and buying one Champion shard for just a {{champion:134}} is pretty much not worth in my opinion. I need only one blue essence to unlock her and I don't want to buy another Champion shard for it.

replies.body:
Typically we keep our little Gift RP program to giving out small amounts of RP only, but I went ahead and checked your account and it looks like you already have enough Blue Essence for that skin shard! Make sure you double check again ^_^!

EDIT: Champion Shard, sometimes all these shards just blend together. My mistake xD
